meanings.definition: Of the color between green and orange in the spectrum.
meanings.sent1: The sunflower had bright yellow petals.
meanings.sent2: The yellow school bus stopped at the corner.
meanings.sent3: The yellow banana tried to hide among the green apples.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as a yellow sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The yellow raincoat stood out in the sea of black umbrellas.

meanings.sent1: The yellow ran away when things got tough.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a yellow and abandon your friends in need.
meanings.sent3: The yellow pretended to be sick to avoid a challenge.
meanings.sent4: He was a yellow, always looking out for himself first.
meanings.sent5: The yellow's true colors showed when faced with danger.

meanings.sent1: The leaves yellowed as autumn approached.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the paper will yellow with age.
meanings.sent3: The old photograph began to yellow around the edges.
meanings.sent4: His teeth started to yellow from too much soda.
meanings.sent5: The once white shirt slowly yellowed after many washes.
